title: She sure loves her trainers! Khloe Kardashian teams a skintight black dress with casual pumps She's always been a sucker for a flashy pair
content:
She's always been a sucker for a flashy pair of pumps. 

And Khloe Kardashian showed they go with anything as she teamed her skin-tight black dress with a pair of hidden-wedge sneakers on Friday. 

Flaunting a figure she's extremely proud of, Khloe smiled happily as she strolled around Beverly Hill.   
   
Her biggest fan: A security guard gets distracted by Khloe Kardashian's bottom as she walks in Beverly Hills on Friday 
  
Too hot to trot: Khloe showed off her shapely figure in a tight black dress  

Khloe wore her long blonde locks down, while her eyes were concealed with oversized aviator shades. 

The reality TV star and fitness fanatic also glammed up her look with some gold jewels. 

And she had the perfect accessory in her large, expensive cherry-coloured Hermes handbag. 

The same day, Khloe was seen arriving at a studio in Van Nuys. 
   
Hard work pays off! The 31-year-old reality TV star has been hitting the gym frequently  
   
Looking good: The reality TV star and fitness fanatic also glammed up her look with some gold jewels 

She also took to Instagram to share a snap of her workout regimen from her recent tropical trip to the Caribbean island of St. Barts. 

'#FBF with my little workout buddy in St Bart's! Yes we did spin class in the pool. @kourtneykardash almost drowned because she's so tiny! I'll never let you go Kourt!!!' caring Khloe wrote with a snap of her and her sister Kourtney, 36, cycling in a pool. 

Meanwhile, Khloe recently had laser surgery to remove her 'tramp stamp' tattoo of a cross with a pair of angel wings and the word 'Daddy' written over it. 
   
Her favourite: Khloe was spotted wearing her signature oversized aviator shades 
   
Matching: Khoe wore crimson nail polish to go with her red Hermes handbag 

It will take up to 12 trips to the good doctor to remove the whole thing, according to TMZ . 

Now the question is: Will she remove the tattoo of ex-husband Lamar Odom' initials on her hand? 

She married the NBA basketball player on September 17, 2009, after knowing him for just one month. 

On December 13, 2013, after months of speculation about their relationship, Khloe filed for divorce, which was finalized in mid-July. 

She is presently dating 26-year-old basketball star James Harden. 

After a few months of dating, the 31-year-old Keeping Up With the Kardashians star and the 26-year-old basketball star are still having fun romancing each other. 
   
High spirits: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians personaity appeared to be in a good mood 
   
Pool time: '#FBF with my little workout buddy in St Bart's!' wrote Khloe, of a picture with her Kourtney
